analysis.description:
ERC223Token_STA.claimMiningReward (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#115-132) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- minedTokens[i].block == block.number

Reentrancy in StableICO.exchangeEthStb (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#551-587):
	External calls:
	- stb.mint(address(this),_mintAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#565-566)
	- stb.transfer(donations[i].donorAddress,10 * ((100 + _bonus) * (donations[i].ethAmount / _wei2stb) / 100)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#576-578)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- donations (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#578-581)
	- donations (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#581-583)

Reentrancy in StableICO.exchangeStaStb (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#521-550):
	External calls:
	- stb.mint(address(this),_mintAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#531-532)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isStbMintedForStaEx (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#532-533)

Reentrancy in StableICO.exchangeStaStb (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#521-550):
	External calls:
	- stb.mint(address(this),_mintAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#531-532)
	- stb.transfer(receivedSta[i].minerAddress,receivedSta[i].staAmount / _sta2stb * oneStaIsStb / 10 ** 4) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#536-540)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- receivedSta (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#540)
	- receivedSta (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#541-542)

ERC223Token_STA.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#88-89) shadows:
	- ERC223.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#30)

ERC223Token_STB.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#260) shadows:
	- ERC223.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#30)
empty in ERC223Token_STB.transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#320) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in ERC223Token_STA.transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#179-181) is a local variable never initialiazed

StableICO.exchangeStaStb (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#521-550) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-stb.transfer(receivedSta[i].minerAddress,receivedSta[i].staAmount / _sta2stb * oneStaIsStb / 10 ** 4) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#536-540)
	-sta.burn(address(this),_toBurn) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#549)

StableICO.exchangeEthStb (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#551-587) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-stb.transfer(donations[i].donorAddress,10 * ((100 + _bonus) * (donations[i].ethAmount / _wei2stb) / 100)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#576-578)

StableICO.transferStbToOwner (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#614-618) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-stb.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#617-618)

StableICO.exchangeStaStb has external calls inside a loop:
	- stb.transfer(receivedSta[i].minerAddress,receivedSta[i].staAmount / _sta2stb * oneStaIsStb / 10 ** 4) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#536-540)

StableICO.exchangeEthStb has external calls inside a loop:
	- stb.transfer(donations[i].donorAddress,10 * ((100 + _bonus) * (donations[i].ethAmount / _wei2stb) / 100)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#576-578)

StableICO.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- donations[i].donorAddress.transfer(donations[i].ethAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#601-602)

Reentrancy in StableICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#476-520):
	External calls:
	- exchangeStaStb(0,minerNum) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#507)
	- exchangeEthStb(0,donationNum) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#511)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#503)
	- drawdown() (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#511)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isDonatedEthTransferred (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#511)

ERC223Token_STA.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#188-203)
	- /unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#194-202

ERC223Token_STB.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#325-340)
	- /unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#336-339
ERC223.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xcebbfe09bab5493714a42de8c3a58fd385ce9c03.sol#30)
